item.yuushya.pos_trans_item.line1: §9Mainhand: Rightclick a [Block Entity] to adjust the selected [Layer]'s offset
item.yuushya.pos_trans_item.line2: §9Offhand: Rightclick to switch the tool's modes(3 in total)
item.yuushya.pos_trans_item.line4: §9Use F3 to know which axis to adjust
item.yuushya.pos_trans_item.switch: X Offset:%s Y Offset:%s Z Offset:%s
item.yuushya.micro_pos_trans_item.line2: §9Mainhand: Rightclick a [Block Entity] to fine-tune its offset
item.yuushya.micro_pos_trans_item.line3: §9Offhand: Rightclick to switch the tool's modes(4 in total)
item.yuushya.micro_pos_trans_item.line4: §9Slightly adjust the [Block Entity Layer]'s status to prevent Z-Fighting
item.yuushya.micro_pos_trans_item.switch: X Offset:%s Y Offset:%s Z Offset:%s
item.yuushya.rot_trans_item.line1: §9Mainhand: Rightclick a [Block Entity] to rotate the selected [Layer]
item.yuushya.rot_trans_item.line2: §9Offhand: Rightclick to switch the tool's modes(3 in total)
item.yuushya.rot_trans_item.line4: §9Use F3 to know which axis to adjust
item.yuushya.rot_trans_item.switch: X Rotation:%s Y Rotation:%s Z Rotation:%s
item.yuushya.scale_trans_item.line2: §9Mainhand: Rightclick and leftclick a [Block Entity] to scale the selected [Layer]
item.yuushya.get_show_block_item.line2: §9Rightclick to turn a block to a [Block Entity]
item.yuushya.get_block_state_item.line2: §9Mainhand: Right click a normal block to copy its Blockstates
item.yuushya.get_block_state_item.line3: §9Offhand: Rightclick a [Block Entity] to apply the copied to its currently selected [Layer]
